title: Glart 48KG1 5-piece set of dish towels kitchen towels dish cloths kitchen cloths, 50x70 cm, 100% cotton OEKO-TEX, grey checked, pre-washed
features: ✅ VERSATILE: Glart cotton tea drying towels are suitable for washing, wiping and drying dishes, glasses and kitchen utensils; indispensable in the kitchen & bathroom; Premium quality: tested for harmful substances and certified according to OEKO Tex Standard 114

✅ HIGHLY ABSORBENT AFTER PRE-WASH: The drying towels are 70x50 cm in size, easy to care for, washable at 60°C and suitable for tumble drying; each tea towel with hanger; Professional quality developed in Germany; Great as a napkin, checkered tablecloth for decoration

✅ PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: Highly absorbent after repeated washing. While many competitors rely on cheap material, Glart offers guaranteed high water absorption, minimal shrinkage and a high cloth weight of over 70g, made from 100% certified fabric. Cotton.

✅ ROBUST AND RESISTANT: Glart kitchen towels are ideal for the hotel and catering industry; We have been producing professional cleaning cloths for 22 years; The dishcloths are very durable and remain permanently supple and absorbent
✅ NUMEROUS VARIANTS in many colors at an affordable set price: you can never have enough dishcloths in stock for washing up in the home, catering establishment, event or office
description: From the manufacturer Glart Cotton Cloths 5 Checked Grey Cotton One Size The perfect assistant in the kitchen. Glart cloths are made from 100% premium cotton, providing exceptional absorbency, durability and performance. They come pre-washed, so they can be used straight away. With bright colours and classic designs, Glart cloths make a functional, attractive finishing touch to your home. They're certified to OEKO-TEX Standard 100 AITEX 2016OK0819, ensuring the highest standards in quality, safety and enviromental responsibility. Wash at 60°C with similar colours, then air dry/tumble dry. The hanging loop is ideal for faster drying and handy storage, keeping cloths out of the way but always within reach. With premium German design, these cloths are perfect for any kitchen. Dimensions: 50 x 70 cm (W x L). 100% cotton. These cloths are pre-washed and can be used straight away, and are free from microplastics. Cotton Cloths 5 Checked Grey. Kitchen cloths for drying and polishing cutlery, dishes, and glasses. Absorbent, soft and lint-free. High level of water absorption thanks to a material weight of 200 g/m. Perfect size and handy format for everyone Cotton has the highest level of water absorbency out of all raw materials.
